# Templates Directory

Quick reference for all lawyer partnership materials and email templates.

---

## Documents

### LAWYER_PARTNERSHIP_AGREEMENT.md
One-page agreement covering service description, pricing ($50/lead), payment terms, territory, lead definition, response times, refund policy, and termination.

**When to use:** Send to lawyers before onboarding. Get signature and return as confirmation.

---

## Email Templates

### EMAIL_COLD_OUTREACH.md
Initial outreach email to potential lawyer partners. Explains the calculator, how lead generation works, and $50 per qualified lead pricing model.

**When to use:** First contact with new lawyers. Personalize with their name, city/region, and phone number.

**Subject line:** "Quick way to identify complex child support cases"

---

### EMAIL_WELCOME_NEW_PARTNER.md
Welcome email for newly onboarded lawyers. Explains how leads flow through the system, what information they'll receive, and next steps for getting started.

**When to use:** After partnership agreement is signed and Stripe is set up. Send before first leads arrive.

**Subject line:** "Welcome to Australian Child Support Calculator - Lead Partnership"

---

### EMAIL_LEAD_FORWARDING.md
Lead notification email. Contains parent's contact info, case summary, complexity flags, Change of Assessment reasons (if applicable), their message, and contact preferences.

**When to use:** Every time a qualified lead comes in from the calculator. Send within 1 hour of form submission.

**Subject line:** "New Lead - [Complexity] - $[Liability]/year"

**Time to customize:** 2 minutes per lead

---

### EMAIL_MONTHLY_INVOICE.md
Monthly billing notification. Lists all qualified leads delivered, total amount due, and Stripe auto-charge timeline.

**When to use:** End of each month. Auto-bill via Stripe after 14 days.

**Subject line:** "Invoice for [Month] - [Number] Leads"

---

### EMAIL_WEEKLY_CHECKIN.md
Short quality feedback request. Ask lawyers to rate lead quality, volume, and any issues. Use responses to track NPS and identify quality issues.

**When to use:** Every Friday to all active lawyer partners.

**Subject line:** "This Week's Leads - [Date]"

**Time investment:** 30 seconds per lawyer response

---

## How to Use These Templates

### Quick Start
1. Copy template content
2. Replace [bracketed] placeholders with actual values
3. Personalize tone if needed
4. Send

### Customization Tips
- **Cold Outreach:** Research lawyer's practice area, mention relevant case types
- **Lead Forwarding:** Always include Change of Assessment reasons if applicable - these are high-value leads
- **Monthly Invoice:** Be specific about lead dates and parent names (helps lawyers remember context)
- **Weekly Check-In:** Track 1-5 star ratings in a spreadsheet to identify quality trends

### Tracking & Automation
These templates can be:
- Stored in email signature templates for quick access
- Imported into email automation tools (Gmail filters, Zapier, Make)
- Used as basis for CRM integration when business scales
